alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:29PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Phillips and western Valley Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 629 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Saco, or 18 miles east of Malta, moving west at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malta, Dodson, Bowdoin, Sleeping Buffalo and Wagner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley
